flawed_nl_solution:
When Katherine is 2 dozen years old, she will be 2*12=<<2*12=24>>24 years old.
If Mel is three years younger than Katherine, then when Katherine is 24 years old, Mel will be 24-3=<<24-3=12>>12 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
